ukbFGSEA 0.2
  • Reference

    Apply Gene Set Enrichment Analysis to Multiple Phenotypes

    map_ukbfgsea.Rd

    This function applies fast preranked gene set enrichment analysis (FGSEA) to multiple phenotypes using a provided gene set. It is designed to handle large-scale datasets efficiently.

    Arguments

    input_geneset

    A list containing one gene set for enrichment analysis. The element of the list should be a character vector of gene Ensembl IDs.

    multiple_phenotypes

    A data frame containing multiple phenotypes from Genebass.

    ...

    Additional arguments passed to ukbfgsea.

    Value

    A data frame containing the results of ukbfgsea for each phenotype annotation. This includes enrichment analysis outcomes using two different ranking metrics, and, if specified, enrichment plots.

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
  library(tidyverse)
  library(ukbFGSEA)
  asd_output <- map_ukbfgsea(input_geneset = ASD185, multiple_phenotypes = genebass_test_data)
} # }
